frontmatter.title: Lectures on Topological and Uniform Spaces

mainmatter.p:
A filter base on a nonempty set X is a family \{ B_i \} _{i \in I} of subsets of \mathcal{P} (X) satisfying the following properties:
I \neq \emptyset and B_i \neq \emptyset for each i \in I
For any two i, j \in I, there exists some k \in I such that B_k \subseteq B_i \cap B_j.
Adapted from the definition in page 21 of Bridges' lecture notes.
